.vergleichsinfo {
	font-family: "Objectivity", Arial, sans-serif;
    width: 100%;
    height: 300px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
}
.vergleichsinfobox::after {
    content: "Anzeige";
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    font-size: 10px;
    opacity: 0.4;
}

.vergleichsinfo-ueberschrift {
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    color: #ef3631;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 24px;
    margin: 0;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 2px;
    position: relative;
}
.vergleichsinfo.scroll:after {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    content: "";
    display: block;
    height: 12px;
    width: 13px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 5px;
    top: 28px;
    z-index: 9999;
}
.vergleichsinfo.scroll::before {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    content: "";
    display: block;
    height: 12px;
    width: 13px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 5px;
    bottom: 22px;
    z-index: 9999;
}
.vergleichsinfo-scroll {
    overflow-x: hidden;
    max-height: 240px;
    overflow-y: scroll;
    width: calc(100% + 17px);
    position: relative;
}
.vergleichsinfo-scroll li {
    width:100%;
    float: left;
}
.vergleichsinfo-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 2px;
}
.vergleichsinfo-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background-color: red!important;
}
.vergleichsinfo-ueberschrift a:hover {
    color: #ef3631;
}
.vergleichsinfo-ueberschrift::after {
    background: #ef3631;
    content: "";
    height: 3px;
    width: 90px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    margin-bottom: -2px;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul.alt {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul {
    margin: 8px 0 0 0;
    padding: 0;
    list-style: none;
    position: relative;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul li {
background: #eaeaea; /* Old browsers */
background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #eaeaea 0%, #fbf4f5 89%, #f0f0f0 84%); /* FF3.6-15 */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #eaeaea 0%,#fbf4f5 89%,#f0f0f0 84%); /* Chrome10-25,Safari5.1-6 */
background: linear-gradient(to right, #eaeaea 0%,#fbf4f5 89%,#f0f0f0 84%); /* W3C, IE10+, FF16+, Chrome26+, Opera12+, Safari7+ */
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#eaeaea', endColorstr='#f0f0f0',GradientType=1 ); /* IE6-9 */
    border-bottom: 1px solid #DEDEDE;
    max-height: 47px;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
}


.vergleichsinfo ul li::after {

    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    position: absolute;
    right: 35px;
    top: 0;
    content: "";
    z-index: 999;
    height: 46px;
    width: 62px;

}
.vergleichsinfo ul li a {
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;
    /* z-index: 9999; */
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 48px;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul li a:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul li a:hover {
    color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.vergleichsinfo ul li a:hover .vergleichsinfo-titel{
    color: #ef3631:;
}

.vergleichsinfo ul li a:hover a {
    color: black;
}

.vergleichsinfo ul li a:hover .vergleichsinfo-titel {

    color: #ef3631;
    text-decoration: none;

}

.vergleichsinfo ul li img {
  filter: grayscale(100);
  opacity: 0.6;
  margin-top: 3px;
}


.vergleichsinfo ul li:hover img {
  filter: none;
  opacity: 1;
}



.vergleichsinfo-logo {
    float: left;
    padding: 10px 10px;
}
.vergleichsinfo-logo img {

    max-height: 20px;

}
.vergleichsinfo-titel {
    line-height: 1;
      font-size: 15px;
       color: #1f1d1d;
       letter-spacing: -.3px;
    display: flex;
        font-weight: 600;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: 48px;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
.vergleichsinfo-footer {
    }

.vergleichsinfo-footer .left {
    float: left;
    margin:0;
}
.vergleichsinfo-footer .right {
    float: right;
     margin:0;
}
.vergleichsinfo-footer {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 16px;
    margin: 5px 0px;
}
.vergleichsinfo-footer a:hover {
    color:#ef3631;
}
.vergleichsinfo span {
    height: 22px;
    width: 36px;
    display: inline-block;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    z-index: 10;
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAACQAAAAWBAMAAABanCMNAAAABGdBTUEAALGPC/xhBQAAAAFzUkdCAK7OHOkAAAAhUExURcwAAP////Xd3eGNjdAmJtdYWPz09Ou4uOiqqt59fdNCQozGjY4AAABISURBVBjTY2CgA2BtYGDgCEAR4hBnYFiWiqqssICBNQ1VGTtQWRhZypiFGBicJFGEDFUYWBQNUBU5MDgJk66IWQVouAEDXQAAV8YKo+uMAG4AAAAASUVORK5CYII=);
}
.arrowbtn {
    float: right;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: 48px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 5px;
}



@media (max-width: 575px) {
.vergleichsinfo-titel {
    max-width: 60%;
    line-height: 1;
}
.vergleichsinfo {
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.vergleichsinfo-ueberschrift {
  text-align: left;
}
    }




/* Scrollbar */
.ss-wrapper {
  overflow: hidden;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  float: left;
}

.ss-content {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0 32px 0 0;
  position: relative;
  right: -18px;
  overflow: auto;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.ss-content.rtl {
  width: calc(100% + 18px);
  right: auto;
}

.ss-scroll {
  position: relative;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  width: 9px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 2;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.25s linear;
}

.ss-hidden {
  display: none;
}

.ss-container:hover .ss-scroll {
  opacity: 1;
}

.ss-grabbed {
  -o-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}

    height: 25px;
    width: 25px;

}
.vergleichsinfo-titel:hover::after {
	background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,")!important;
	height: 25px;
    width: 25px;
    display: inline-block;
    color: #fff;
    content: "";
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    right: 20px;
    margin-right: 15px;
    position: absolute;

}

.vergleichsinfo-ueberschrift a {
	font-family: font-family: "Objectivity", Arial, sans-serif;

}
.vergleichsinfo-footer a {

    font-size: 13px;

    font-weight: 600;
	text-decoration: none!important;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #ef4844!important;
}
.vergleichsinfo-footer a:hover {

}
